Detailed Description

A text browser that supports HTML, including hyper-text links that open in the user's browser.

void DzStaticBrowser::setAutoFollowLinks ( bool  onOff  )  [slot]

Sets whether or not links will be opened in the user's browser when they are clicked on.

Parameters:
onOff If true, links will be follwed, if false, nothing will happen when links are clicked.
